clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text:
For further details, please see the Statcounter privacy policy the:
https://statcounter.com/about/legal/#privacy

Google reCaptcha 速

We embed Google reCaptcha to use with forms as an added layer of deterrence to spam and other malicious uses. Use of this feature requires agreement with Google's Privacy Policy. Such agreement is between the reader and Google and is separate from your agreement with the Privacy Policy for gapcreekmedia.com.

Google Maps 速

We embed Google Maps to help website visitors locate the places we visit. Use of this feature assume agreement with Google's Privacy Policy. Such agreement is between the reader and Google and is separate from your agreement with the Privacy Policy for gapcreekmedia.com.

Google Fonts 速

We embed Google Fonts to provide a more enjoyable reading experience on our website. Use of this feature assumes agreement with Google's Privacy Policy. Such agreement is between the reader and Google and is separate from your agreement with the Privacy Policy for gapcreekmedia.com.

YouTube 速

case.text: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: • Referring Data e.g. a search engine link (this can help us to understand which search engines are helping visitors to find our website)

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
We use Statcounter because better understanding how visitors are interacting with our website helps us to improve the content, design and functionality of our site. This allows us to offer a better online experience to our visitors.

Statcounter uses cookies and other technologies to collect data on visitors and visitor activity on our website.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.
clauses.clause_text:
We use forms to facilitate communication and to provide technical support to website visitors.
These forms ask for personally identifiable information.
Providing your information is completely optional and voluntary on your part.

case.text: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
Browser and Operating System (this can help us to make sure that our website functions correctly in the browsers/operating systems used to access our site)
  • Device Information e.g. device type and screen size (this can help us to make sure that our website functions correctly in the devices used to access our site)

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
What rights you have over your data

If you have submitted personal information on this website, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you. You can also request that we delete any personal data we hold about you.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Blocking tracking technologies will not negatively impact your use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: You may refuse cookies from Stacounter.

case.text: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: Emails received from form submissions are only retained while relevant to an ongoing request and no more than 30 days.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: In such case that you have submitted a form and would like us to expedite the deletion of your information, you may request all data be permanently deleted.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: Data Stored by gapcreekmedia.com

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
clauses.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.
clauses.clause_text: We have provided a list of third-party services and resources that we may integrate into this website to help you identify your privacy rights and responsibilities according to those services and resources.

case.text: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: When you submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected by an SSL.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
clauses.description: When you're not logged in to a service, but use it repeatedly, it may still feel weird that their terms and conditions can change between one use and the next. However, this does not violate the rule-of-thumb that each new version should be accepted from scratch, without inferring your acceptance from the acceptance of an earlier version. Since no acceptance is inferred from continued use, but only from current use, we rate this as neutral instead of bad.
clauses.clause_text: This Privacy Policy is subject to change without notice

case.text: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance

clauses.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
clauses.clause_text: We do not accept any liability or responsibility for your agreement to the Terms of Service or the Privacy Policy of any websites linked to from this website

case.text: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last Updated March 17, 2022, 8:59 AM (Eastern)

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Blocking Cookies on this website may degrade or limit the functionality of this website.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text:
This website contains links to other websites.
Please be aware that we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of other websites.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: Illegal activity will be promptly reported to law enforcement.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
This data includes:

  • Time and date of visit (this can help us to identify and plan for busy periods on our website)
  • IP address (this is a numerical label assigned to a device by an Internet Service Provider to enable the device to access the internet)

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
